metadata.title: CVE-2014-3247 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Collabtive 1.2 allows remoteauthenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the descparameter in an Add project (addpro) action to admin.php.

criterions.comment: collabtive: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
